SEARCH
Module main_module
Package main_module.model.managers

Class TemporalTileManager

java.lang.Object
main_module.model.managers.TemporalTileManager
public class TemporalTileManager extends Object
The TemporalTileManager class is responsible for generating temporal tiles with or without collision. It provides methods to create instances of TemporalTile entities based on the specified TileType, side effects, and a specified time duration.

  • Method Details

    • generateTemporalTileWithCollision

      public Entity generateTemporalTileWithCollision(Vector pos, TileType tileType, SideEffect sideEffect, long time)
      Generates a temporal tile with collision based on the specified position, TileType, side effect, and time duration.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the generated temporal tile.
      tileType - The type of temporal tile to generate.
      sideEffect - The side effect associated with the temporal tile.
      time - The time duration for which the temporal tile remains active.
      Returns:
      An instance of the generated temporal tile with collision.

    • generateTemporalTileWithNoCollision

      public Entity generateTemporalTileWithNoCollision(Vector pos, TileType tileType, long time)
      Generates a temporal tile without collision based on the specified position, TileType, and time duration.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the generated temporal tile.
      tileType - The type of temporal tile to generate.
      time - The time duration for which the temporal tile remains active.
      Returns:
      An instance of the generated temporal tile without collision.

    • selectImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image selectImage(TileType tileType)
      Selects the image for the specified TileType.
      Parameters:
      tileType - The type of tile for which to select the image.
      Returns:
      The image associated with the specified tile type.
